mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(or_dte, '%Y') AS or_year FROM sm_orders GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(or_dte, '%Y') ORDER BY or_year DESC

SELECT months.m AS month, COALESCE(SUM(orderCnt), 0) AS orderCnt FROM (SELECT 1 AS m UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9 UNION SELECT 10 UNION SELECT 11 UNION SELECT 12) AS months LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(b.or_dte, '%m') AS MONTH, SUM( IFNULL(es_cnt1,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt2,0)+ IFNULL(es_cnt3,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt4,0)+ IFNULL(es_cnt5,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt6,0)+ IFNULL(es_cnt7,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt8,0)+ IFNULL(es_cnt9,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt10,0) ) AS orderCnt FROM sm_estimate a JOIN sm_orders b ON a.es_idx = b.es_idx JOIN sm_delivery c ON b.OR_IDX=c.OR_IDX WHERE (DATE_FORMAT(or_dte, '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') AND YEAR(or_dte) = #{searchCondition2}) AND b.OR_STATE=3 GROUP BY MONTH ) AS subquery ON months.m = subquery.MONTH GROUP BY months.m ORDER BY months.m

SELECT months.m AS month, COALESCE(SUM(orderCnt), 0) AS orderCnt FROM (SELECT 1 AS m UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9 UNION SELECT 10 UNION SELECT 11 UNION SELECT 12) AS months LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(b.or_dte, '%m') AS MONTH, SUM( IFNULL(es_cnt1,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt2,0)+ IFNULL(es_cnt3,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt4,0)+ IFNULL(es_cnt5,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt6,0)+ IFNULL(es_cnt7,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt8,0)+ IFNULL(es_cnt9,0)+IFNULL(es_cnt10,0) ) AS orderCnt FROM sm_estimate a JOIN sm_orders b ON a.es_idx = b.es_idx WHERE (DATE_FORMAT(or_dte, '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') AND YEAR(or_dte) = #{searchCondition2}) GROUP BY MONTH ) AS subquery ON months.m = subquery.MONTH GROUP BY months.m ORDER BY months.m

SELECT months.m AS month, COALESCE(SUM(prodCnt), 0) AS prodCnt FROM (SELECT 1 AS m UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7 UNION SELECT 8 UNION SELECT 9 UNION SELECT 10 UNION SELECT 11 UNION SELECT 12) AS months LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(b.PR_RE_ED_DTE, '%m') AS MONTH, SUM(WO_PDT_CNT) AS prodCnt FROM sm_prod_result b JOIN sm_work_order c ON b.wo_idx = c.wo_idx JOIN sm_orders d ON c.or_idx = d.or_idx WHERE PR_LIST_NM = '저장탱크 이송' AND YEAR(b.PR_RE_ED_DTE) = #{searchCondition2} GROUP BY MONTH ) AS subquery ON months.m = subquery.MONTH GROUP BY months.m ORDER BY months.m
